alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Vinton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jackson and northwestern Vinton Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 413 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chillicothe to South Shore. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Wellston, Mcarthur, Oak Hill, Hamden, Coalton, Petersburg, Mabee, Allensville, Creola, Eagle Mills, and Byer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building until the storms pass. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
